name: Preschool
description: For children between 2.8 - 8 years. Full-time only; they do not offer part-time programs at this time. Preschool hours are Mon - Fri 8am to 6pm.
fullDescription: For children between 2.8 - 8 years. Full-time only; they do not offer part-time programs at this time. Preschool hours are Mon - Fri 8am to 6pm.
whatTheyOffer: For children between 2.8 - 8 years. Full-time only; they do not offer part-time programs at this time. Preschool hours are Mon - Fri 8am to 6pm.
howToGetIt: First set up a parent/child visit. Then fill out an application.
cost: This is a fee based service.
